hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that an #invisible spinning blade# in the Shadow Temple guards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Ganon's Castle Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Invisible Blades Visible Chest
Shadow Temple MQ Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Goron Tunic#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that leaping above the Market entrance enriches most children.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: Use Multiworld to cross the gaps between worlds and engage in jolly co-operation!

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a spider under a #crate in the crater# holds #a Red Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #2# major items.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a hero ventures #beyond the wasteland# to learn #Epona's Song#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
